title.narrative: Access To Justice Project

description.narrative: Benin - Access To Justice Project: This project was designed to improve the efficiency of the judicial systems in enforcing contracts and resolving claims to strengthen the institutional environment for business. It aimed to reduce the time to solve cases by increasing staff and facilities, to increase cases treated by a local arbitration center, and to decrease time required to register a business.
